scenario: Marriott International Inc. MAR announced plans to acquire lifestyle hotel brand CitizenM for $355 million. The acquisition includes 36 operating hotels in over 20 cities worldwide and three hotels under construction, with long-term expansion planned across Marriott's global regions. Marriott will pay $355 million upfront and the seller may earn up to an additional $110 million based on brand expansion achievements over a multi-year timeframe. The deal is expected to close in 2025 pending regulatory approvals. Marriott held $400 million in cash and equivalents as of Dec. 31, 2024. The acquisition is expected to drive Marriott's net room growth to nearly 5% for the full year 2025. MAR shares traded higher by 1.75% at $240.34 at last check Monday.
